name: Escape from Bondage
description:
Defeat the invaders in the apartment and escape!

This is a ROWARD's solo project.

[How to play]

Mouse -Camera
LeftClick -Shoot
RightClick -Zoomin,Zoomout
E Key -Interact
Q Key -Interact Object off
WASD -Move
Space -Jump
Tab Key -How to play
